q: Print Andy Coulson quits Downing Street communications role The prime minister's communications chief Andy Coulson has resigned, blaming coverage of the News of the World phone hacking scandal. Mr Andy Coulson said coverage had made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role . He faced pressure after claims about phone hacking while he was editor.
